.. :changelog:

History
-------

0.1.3
-----

* Speed improvements 


0.1.2
-----

* Major refactoring
* Thread stops after player has exitted.
* Passing all params from get_parallel_magnets to get_blocking_magnet


0.1.1
-----

* Fixed some major bugs
* Replaced magnet dependency for a urllib call

0.1.0 (2015-04-12)
---------------------

* First release on PyPI.
